column4: i just installed 12.04 to my laptop and the cpu-battery performance is really horrible. usage is constantly jumping around 20-90 percents. what could be the reason? this machine perfomed really well on speed and battery sustain on win7.
id check the forums and askubuntu.com for your exact make of laptop. there may be some known issues and work arounds.
will give it a shot. do you agree that its abnormal to have 20-90 percent of cpu usage on an idle machine with clean installation?
theres been issues in the kernel/power saveing features with laptops for the last 2 releases or so. 12.04 fixed a lot of them. but new laptops keep comming out that the fixs dont work on.
